justification: “rats received a within-subject evaluation of acute (60 min) restraint stress… The apparatus for acute restraint stress was a clear plexiglass cylindrical restraining device…”

“The goal of this experiment was to test… in a two-stage decision-making task… Rats learn to choose in stage 1… This task can include test trials (Probe trials) to evaluate whether action sequences are being performed using an action chunking strategy or by evaluating each individual action.”

measured_by: probe trials within the two-stage task (rare vs common transitions)
justification: “On these probe trials… the discriminative stimulus for the stage 2 action is switched in order to assess whether the rat completes the action sequence… Thus, the probe trials can discern between habitual action sequences… or discrete successive choices.”

measured_by: intermixed discrimination training with panel light stimuli and lever presses
justification: “Rats were expected to learn the association between the light stimulus, its associated lever press, and reward during intermixed discrimination training sessions.”
